site_url.description: The URL of the website for which the search analytics data is retrieved.

search_type.description: The type of search conducted (e.g., web, image, video).

date.description: The date when the search data was recorded.

country.description: The country from which the search query originated.

device.description: The device type used for the search query (e.g., desktop, mobile).

query.description: The search query used by the user.

clicks.description: The number of times users clicked on your website link in search results.

impressions.description: The number of times your website link appeared in search results.

ctr.description: Click-through rate: Number of clicks divided by the number of impressions.

position.description: The average position of your website link in search results.
